FuncDef:
The efm trigger mac-renew command configures the system to clear the MAC address table on a physical interface.
The undo efm trigger mac-renew command disables the system from clearing the MAC address table on a physical interface.
By default, the MAC address table is not cleared on an interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To detect faults in a VLL configured on the PE connected to a CE and perform PW switching by clearing the MAC address table, you can run the efm trigger mac-renew command on the relevant interface of the CE.
Prerequisites
EFM OAM has been enabled using the efm enable command in the interface view.
Precautions
Both the efm trigger mac-renew and efm trigger if-down commands cannot be configured on the same interface.
